subject: Kentucky Derby
Preakness Stakes
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: LOUISVILLE, Ky., May 7 — It was easy to find trainers who had respect for Barbaro on Sunday morning on the Churchill Downs backstretch. There was no other way to feel after he demolished 19 opponents a day earlier in the Kentucky Derby. But there was no one issuing a concession speech.
